## Item Cycler

Allows cycling through items with D-Pad Left and D-Pad Right. You can cycle to the left (previous item) and to the right (next item). Items are infinite. Very simple to use, useful for debugging and for fun!

<details>
<summary>Nunchuk</summary> 

```powerpc
C221BB4C 0000001C
7C7D1B78 3FC080C0
8B5E3088 819E30AC
2C0C0002 41820058
819E309C 2C0C0000
41820054 3D80804F
A16CXXXX 716C0003
418200A0 899E3089
2C0C0000 4082009C
919E309C 716B0002
40820018 3B5AFFFC
2C1A0004 4080001C
3B40002C 48000014
3B5A0004 2C1A002C
40810008 3B400004
9B5E3088 48000031
84418B5F 7711877D
9A67CB42 0053F395
EEC55D13 805C3C3B
84917C21 53EB2F26
D8AE59CB 953D2512
B678E022 7C8802A6
3884FFFC 63C317F0
7C84D02E 38A00002
3D808021 618CE760
7D8903A6 4E800421
39800001 48000008
39800000 999E3089
7FA3EB78 00000000
```
</details>
